sentences.en: A few red roses were scattered on the tomb.
sentences.cn: 那座坟墓上散放着几朵红玫瑰.

sentences.en: A group of students placed a wreath at the tomb of the national hero.
sentences.cn: 一群学生在那位民族英雄墓前献上花圈.

sentences.en: But the enemies of tyranny - whither does their path tend? To the tomb, and to immortality!
sentences.cn: 可是暴政的敌人,他们的道路又会引向何方 呢 ?引向坟墓, 引向永生!

sentences.en: Did the tomb raider routine come from wanting daddy's attention?
sentences.cn: 你这么爱冒险是为了引起你爸的注意 吧 ?

sentences.en: He had closed the tomb of the past and sealed the door tight.
sentences.cn: 他把过去的坟墓又深深地封闭了.

sentences.en: Mary Magdalene came to pay her respects at the tomb.
sentences.cn: 抹大拉马利亚前来墓穴致意.

sentences.en: The old linen smelled of the tomb.
sentences.cn: 旧亚麻布散发出墓地的气味.

sentences.en: the tomb of the Unknown Soldier
There is an inscription on the tomb.
They found several glazed clay pots in the ancient tomb.
sentences.cn: 他们在古墓中发现了一些上釉的陶罐.

sentences.en: They had dug out an ancient tomb.
sentences.cn: 他们已发掘到一座古墓.

sentences.en: What is learned in the cradle is carried to the tomb.
Wreaths were laid at the martyr's tomb.
Yet one tomb - stone served for both.
sentences.cn: 然而两座坟却共用一块墓碑.

trans.tran_en: a stone structure above or below the ground where a dead person is buried
